review: Feminora women's clinic for prolonged periods .got well after treatment. Doctor explains the problem clearly . Thank you  doctor
Doctor is well knowledged and patient while listening .spends much time in consultation . would highly recommend

* *** * ******** ********** ** *** ******** ******* ******* *** ******** ******** ***** * *** ******* *** ********** ** **** ***** *********** *** ******** ******** ** **** ********* I was stressed due to health issues* *** *** **** ********* ** *** Visiting her clinic was my biggest mistake.*** ******** ***** **** *** *** ******** ******* ********** *** **** ** * **** ****** *** *** ***** * **** ****** *** ** * ****** *** ** ***** **** *********** *********** **** ***** **** ****** **** ******* *** ** **** ******* ** ***** ****** *** she says she recommended this FdA approved tablets to her friends and relatives also. ** ***** ********* ********* *** ***** ** ** *** ********* *** **** ********* she is not accessing the root cause **** ****** *** *********** ***** * *****
There is a board on the reception stating 10% flat off on payment above 1000 but I paid the bill of 3k which includes a scan, consultation & one test ********* and when I asked I should get 10% off.. The lady on reception was like mam you should buy medicines here then you will get discount.
Good, seriously.
She took 1 week to provide a report & when I called multiple time to check for the progress it was like we will call you when the reports are ready & reason they are giving is lab people are delaying ***** ** ***** **** **** ** ******* ** ** ********* ********* *** ***** ******* ************ **** **** **** *** *** ** ****** ******* ** ***** ********* ******

When I consulted back after the reports arrived a week later she says it's all good and prescribed one more Antibiotic out of nowhere. Also she prescribed one more test after a certain period of time * ****** ** **** ******* ** *** **** *** *** * ********** **** ** ***** ** ****** ******* ******** *** *** * ************** ****** ** * ****** **** *** *** ****** *** *** **** *** *** **** ***** ****** ** ****** ****** * ******* ***** ******* ******* *** ***** *** ***** * ******** *** ** **** i regret to visit.

HIGHLY NOT RECOMMENDABLE

Hospital staff is very good, The nurses and staff are very co operative also the doctors make an efficent team. However Doctor's have very less patience and time with patient. Sometimes they scare patient to stay back in hospital.

I do not recommend people who expect good quality of treatment. But one thing I felt good about this hospital is they provide treatment to the poor people better and reduce fee.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am visiting Dr Smitha since 6 years for all my health issues, she is kind and obliging. she looks into our health concerns rather than just prescribing, also listens patiently which is more important is what I feel.
She is very polite and listens to the problem completely. Medication worked quickly. She made sure other medication conflicts before conflicts...

Dr. Smitha listened to my health problem very carefully, investigated the root cause of the issue and gave me proper medication. She gave diet tips and cleared all our doubts without frowning. Dr Smitha had a lot of patience to answer all my doubts each and every time when I visited the clinic which gave me clarity & confidence. I want to highly recommend this Gynecologist to all the pregnant ladies.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is very experienced and listens to all our problems. She avoids unnecessary medications and tests. Suggests tests only if required. I have been consulting for her for many problems like Gynic, general , Thyroid and for any kind of health issues since two years. She suggests to best doctors if required for any additional specialized analysis to find the root cause.Also Provides good tips to reduce the illness naturally if possible. I trust this doctor
Friendly , explained the issue clearly for better understanding. Was not in hurry , gave her full time . Was really satisfied.would highly recommend.
